message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be of significant value to your business.  While I cannot disclose the exact nature of the product at this time, I can assure you it is worth at least $1200000 to me.  I'm confident it will be even more valuable to you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000. This represents a significant potential gain for you. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
